issue.title: [build cop] One liner install for Gazebo 7 failing to run Gazebo on Jenkins

content.raw:
Also, the homebrew one liner started failing:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopFail/job/gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64/405/console

According to @scpeters , "the gazebo7 bottle install is now broken due to a recent upgrade to protobuf, we need to rebuild any bottles that depend on protobuf."
content.html:
Also, the homebrew one liner started failing:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopFail/job/gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64/405/console

According to @scpeters , "the gazebo7 bottle install is now broken due to a recent upgrade to protobuf, we need to rebuild any bottles that depend on protobuf."
